report.title: Minimal Memory Enhancment
report.author: Berry Boy
report.bodytext: I had never tried a 'smart drug' before and decided it would be worth my time to try. /n /n The next day I drove down to my local super market and picked up a bottle of 60 mg. (24% concentration) ginkgo Biloba tablets. /n /n I have previous experience with psychoactive drugs, anti-depressants and stimulants. I have been taking ginkgo for about four months now. /n /n During the first week I noticed little, if any, effects. At the two week point I started to notice some mild increases in short term memory as well as memory of past childhood experiences. /n /n While on ginkgo, I noticed not so much that I was able to remember things more clearly or thoroughly, it was more like being able to remember that there WAS a date or event to remember. /n /n I also noticed a slight increase in energy, both mental and physical.
